title: He Lost His Police Job Over Daniel Prude. Now He’s Running for Congress.
description: The ex-police chief in Rochester, N.Y., La’Ron Singletary, has focused on public safety in his bid to unseat the incumbent Democrat, Joseph Morelle.
dc:creator: Jesse McKinley
media:credit: Lauren Petracca for The New York Times
media:description: La’Ron Singletary, the former police chief in Rochester, N.Y., recently got financial support from the National Republican Congressional Committee in his bid for the House.
